column2:
Easier more accessible way to add events! Type in text / numbers for the various fields. Can export directly into Godot project.
Event Description is the main text displayed. Each Choice text should be kept relatively short. 
Each Metric event is represented. Can be positive or negative.
Instead of using Commas please use semi-colons";"!

column4: Event Description
column10: Choice 2 Text

column4: String
column10: String

column4: It's my birthday; get me a present!
column10: Something expensive

column4: I have to work late again tonight
column10: You work so hard!

column4: My friends want me to come on vacation with them.
column10: No way; I'll take you somewhere!

column4: I want a pet!
column10: That'll be so much work!

column4: Do you still love me?
column5: Your mommy issues are too much
column10: Let's merge with the lifestream...together!

column4: Will you be my +1 to my cousin's wedding?
column10: That sounds like a living hell!

column4: My parents want to meet you.
column10: Let's go do karaoke

column4: I just stole Elon Musk's bitcoin wallet.
column10: Hello; officer? Yes; this one right here!

column4: I've started playing high stakes poker and I feel like I have to keep chasing those wins.
column5: All in! I'll start shopping for five star hotel breaks!
column10: Maybe you should ease off if it stops being fun

column4: What should we do for dinner?
column10: Dress up; we’re going out

column4: Sorry I didn't text back sooner; my phone died.
column10: I was worried! Please carry a charger next time.

column4: I think I want a new haircut.
column5: A fresh new look sounds fun!
column10: You don't need to change anything about you!

column4: I want to reorganise the whole living room.
column5: Let’s do it together this weekend.
column10: Have fun; I'll be in the bar!

column4: I bought matching outfits for us. Cute; right?
column10: Hahahaha you're so funny. But no. Never.

column4: What's your favorite photo of us?
column10: That one with mostly me

column4: I reorganized your stuff to "help"
column5: Please ask first; I have a system
column10: That's great! Now show me where everything is?

column4: I booked a fancy restaurant for Friday night; but...oh; aren't you seeing your friends?
column10: I love the thought; can we do it next week when I'm free?

column4: I've been reading how it's really good for energy to wake up at 5am every day.
column5: Sounds amazing! I'll try it with you!
column10: Sounds amazing! You can tell me all about it after 8!

column4: I ordered twenty llamas because they were on sale
column10: Return AT LEAST nineteen of them

column4: I told my boss we can host the team retreat at your place
column5: If it helps you get that big promotion...okay; I guess
column10: If you want me to tell your coworkers what I REALLY think of them; be my guest

column4: You'd get a matching tattoo with me; right?
column5: That's a big commitment. Maybe we start with matching socks.
column10: I know a great portrait artist; I think your face on my arm would be a great look!

column4: I volunteered us to judge a hot pepper contest.
column5: Let’s destroy our taste buds together.
column10: You judge

column4: Would I be on your zombie team if an outbreak happened?
column5: You and me baby; repopulating the planet if we survive
column10: Let's be pragmatic here. How hard can you swing a bat?
